body:
Meeee,

We are in the process of converting over all of our example file onto a new platform that was created over the last couple of months:

[https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html](https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html)

I have not gotten the chance to convert all of the files on my youtube videos over yet but I will post here once I have finished.  In the meantime, you can find all available Honeybee files here:

[https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html?keywords=HBExampleFiles](https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html?keywords=HBExampleFiles)

and all available ladybug files here:

[https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html?keywords=LBExampleFiles](https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html?keywords=LBExampleFiles)

-Chris
